reviewText: the DVD is a average collection of short movies. the Alfred Hitchcock inspired one is the most funny of the videso. the men on fur on men one is very cute, lots of close up of a few men's body hair. all the videos are full of very sexy men.

Save your money and time. Find something else to watch.

I gave it a second chance and all I can say is that I am still shocked that I spent actual money on this DVD.

Again save you time and money but something else.

If you like bear-themed (the gay kind) stuff, this is a worthwhile purchase. By far the best clips are the sing-along "An der Nordseekste", and "Avec des Excuses  Alfred". There's nothing deep here, but most of it's fun to watch. I'm looking forward to seeing volume 2!
